attributes.action: Review repayment terms for child benefit.
attributes.background: Review the pay back rules for child benefit to be based on a household income of £100k or more. Currently if 1 parent earns over £50k you need to start to pay back child benefit. However a household can have 2 parents earning £49k each and not have to pay any child Benefit back. How is this fair?

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Base Child Benefit High Income Charge on household income and local wages: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616917

Increase the threshold at which child benefit is repaid from £50k to £60k: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619386
